author: ianna
body:
#### PR description:

As discussed during Sim meeting [here,](https://indico.cern.ch/event/962226/contributions/4047859/attachments/2120196/3568354/DD%20Core%20Migration%20Sim%20meeting%2009%20Oct%202020.pdf) current state of the XML files does not allow their parallel processing, so there is no need for TBB that has on overhead. This PR replaces them with std ones.

CMSSW_11_2_X_2020-10-09-1100:
```diff
TimeModule> 1 1 test DDCMSDetector 2.09666
TimeModule> 1 1 testVectors DDTestVectors 0.000801802
TimeModule> 1 1 testDump DDTestDumpFile 0.372976
TimeModule> 1 1 testGeoIter DDTestDumpGeometry 6.0661
TimeModule> 1 1 p PathStatusInserter 8.4877e-05
TimeModule> 1 1 TriggerResults TriggerResultInserter 3.29018e-05
TimeEvent> 1 1 8.53756
MemoryReport> Peak virtual size 672.719 Mbytes
rss  = 234.75 Mbytes
```
CMSSW_11_2_X_2020-10-09-1100 plus this PR:
```diff
TimeModule> 1 1 test DDCMSDetector 1.79474
TimeModule> 1 1 testVectors DDTestVectors 0.000830889
TimeModule> 1 1 testDump DDTestDumpFile 0.45456
TimeModule> 1 1 testGeoIter DDTestDumpGeometry 5.90832
TimeModule> 1 1 p PathStatusInserter 9.39369e-05
TimeModule> 1 1 TriggerResults TriggerResultInserter 3.29018e-05
TimeEvent> 1 1 8.15958
MemoryReport> Peak virtual size 708.672 Mbytes
rss = 226.383 Mbytes
```
